name: A Surprise for a Shark
description:
Made with GameMaker 2 for the Yogscast Game Jam 2020.

Help the Master of Stealth surprise the shark with a gift. You earn points by entering the same square as the shark while he is not expecting you. The more more surprised the shark is, the more points you gain. Amass 1000 points to win.

Sharks have every keen senses. The red fog shows 'shark vision' where the shark is expecting to find you. The shark will not be surprised if you come at him from these locations.
